dict.acceptation: 里面的，内部的；内幕的；内侧的；
里面，内侧；内脏；内容，内幕；（道路或跑道拐弯处的）内侧；
在内地，在内部地；在内侧地；在监狱里；
在…以内；在内侧或内部；进入里面；

sent.orig: Collects hotly along with inside-bottle painting elevates temperature unceasingly inside-bottle painting collection price also unceasingly rises.
sent.trans: 随着内画收藏热不断升温，内画的收藏价格也不断走高。

sent.orig: Inside my office as a stove, and I grilled on the inside.
sent.trans: 我的办公室里面就象一个火炉一样，而我就在里面烤。

sent.orig: Wipe out the inside of cupboards. First removing whatever is inside the cupboards.
sent.trans: 清洁橱柜内部，首先把柜子里的东西拿出来。

sent.orig: These Swans will eat up fish inside fish and they will swallow men inside men.
sent.trans: 这些天鹅会吃光鱼中之鱼，会吞吃人中之人。

sent.orig: To walk inside it is to walk inside an intricate, half-translucent nautilus.
sent.trans: 走进它，就走进了一只精致的半透明鹦鹉螺。
